sentences.en: A third factor promoting Pushtunwali is one of its most appealing features, egalitarianism.
sentences.cn: 促进“普什图瓦里”发扬的第三个因素是其最吸引人的特色之一:平等主义.

sentences.en: A tourist encounters a whole new machinery for the attainment of egalitarianism: the beheading of state officials at the end of their respective terms.
sentences.cn: 一个旅行者遇到了一架为了达到平等主义而造出来的全新的机器：它用来在任期结束的时候砍去国家官员的头。

sentences.en: But this deeply held egalitarianism also makes the Nordic model difficult to export.
sentences.cn: 而这种根深蒂固的平等主义也使北欧模式的输出遭遇困境.

sentences.en: Egalitarianism and the Russian rural commune were closely related.
sentences.cn: 平均主义与俄国的农村公社密切联系在一起.

sentences.en: However the gini coefficient is not the best way to measure egalitarianism.
sentences.cn: 然而,基尼系数并不是衡量平均主义最好的办法.

sentences.en: THE idea of the universal middle class is a pervasive expression of American egalitarianism — and perhaps the only one left.
sentences.cn: 世界中产阶级是美国平均主义的一种无处不在的表现形式——也许是唯一遗留下来的。

sentences.en: The maoist state preached egalitarianism and relied on the loyalty of workers and peasants.
sentences.cn: 毛的国家主张平等主义和依靠工人农民的忠诚。

sentences.en: They might benefit, for instance, from knowing about work suggesting that "a certain level of egalitarianism" in relationships seems to be healthy.
sentences.cn: 比如，有研究表明，在关系中“一定程度的平等主义”似乎是健康的，了解这样的研究就可能会令关系受益。

sentences.en: Underlying this is a deep sense of egalitarianism, especially in the education system.
sentences.cn: 这背后蕴藏的是一种深刻的平等主义意识, 尤其是在教育体系中.

sentences.en: We shall allow some areas to become rich first ; Egalitarianism will not work.
sentences.cn: 要让一部分地方先富裕起来,搞平均主义不行.

trans.tran_en: Egalitarianism is used to refer to the belief that all people are equal and should have the same rights and opportunities, and to actions that are based on this belief
